Reference

Estimating conjugation rates

Functions to estimate conjugation rates.

estimate_conj_rate()

Estimate plasmid conjugation rates

Estimating critical times

Functions to estimate critical times.

estimate_crit_time()

Estimate critical times

scan_crit_time()

Scan critical times

Estimating growth rates

Functions to estimate growth rates.

estimate_growth_rate()

Fit input data to a logistic growth function

get_growth_fit_for_plot()

Growth fit for plotting get_growth_fit_for_plot computes a vector of the fit of the growth data, for comparison against the OD data.
